description: Information about approval reviews for a version of a change template in Change Manager.

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the change template.

parameters.name: Metadata
parameters.description: The type of data for which details are being requested. Currently, the only supported value is DocumentReviews.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the change template.

nested_items.name: DocumentVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the change template.

nested_items.name: Author
nested_items.description: The user ID of the person in the organization who requested the review of the change template.

nested_items.name: ReviewerResponse
nested_items.description: Details about a reviewer's response to a document review request.

nested_items.name: CreateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that a reviewer entered a response to a document review request.

nested_items.name: UpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that a reviewer last updated a response to a document review request.

nested_items.name: ReviewStatus
nested_items.description: The current review status of a new custom SSM document created by a member of your organization, or of the latest version of an existing SSM document.

nested_items.name: Comment
nested_items.description: The comment entered by a reviewer as part of their document review response.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of information added to a review request. Currently, only the value Comment is supported.

nested_items.name: Content
nested_items.description: The content of a comment entered by a user who requests a review of a new document version, or who reviews the new version.

nested_items.name: Reviewer
nested_items.description: The user in your organization assigned to review a document request.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The maximum number of items to return for this call. The call also returns a token that you can specify in a subsequent call to get the next set of results.
